backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product, enquiry, feedback, message, and settings types with map-based storage plus authorization and blob-storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old admin-passkey fields to an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all public and guarded admin routes wrapped in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding, quick links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, routed content, WhatsApp button, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders a responsive navigation bar with links, logo, login button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Shows a floating WhatsApp button based on site settings, linking to a prefilled chat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides admin session checks, passkey verification, and user profile fetch/save hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for products, enquiries, feedback, messages, and related mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabbed panels for managing products, enquiries, and site settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Standalone page that renders the admin enquiries panel.
Displays all enquiries with actions to confirm or reject them using mutation hooks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFeedbackPa: Fetches and lists all customer feedback submissions in a table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Provides the admin dashboard layout, navigation tabs, logout handling, and routing to admin subpages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Shows all contact form messages in a table with loading and no-data fallback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Wrapper that renders the main products management panel.
Manages product listing and creation, including a form dialog with file upload and product submission.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRouteGuard: Protects admin routes by requiring passkey verification before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Loads and edits site-wide settings including contact info, WhatsApp config, certifications, and pricing table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTwoStepAcc: React UI component prompting for an admin passkey, handling submission, error display, and verify state.
frontend/src/pages/AdvantagesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of HDPE pipe advantages with icons and page title setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form that validates input, submits messages via API, and displays company contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, feature highlights, company info, and navigation CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/OrderEnquiryPage.tsx: Provides an order/enquiry form with validation, file upload support, and submission handling for quotes or orders.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product listings with images, details, availability status, and loading skeletons.
Shows various applications of HDPE pipes using icon-based cards and descriptive text.
frontend/src/utils/adminCredentials.ts: Empty file placeholder for admin credential utilities.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session state in sessionStorage, including passkey storage, unlock state, logout, and change notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL/hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme options, colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing admin passkey login requirements, issues, and feature requests.
